reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting its amazing quality and color, and appreciate its flattering design, particularly for people with tummies and chunky women. The material receives positive feedback for its lovely, thicker fabric, and customers describe it as comfortable, with one mentioning it's forgiving of different body types. The length receives mixed reviews - while some find it perfect for sen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great dress!
items.body: I loved this dress. I felt the sizing was accurate, I couldâ€™ve gone up a size but it was comfortable and stylish! (Iâ€™m normally a 16-18, and I ordered an XL.) No need to steam, most wrinkles fell right out. It is a true tie, and also has a button on the inside so it sits flush! Such a nice touch. The fabric was nice, thick, and sturdy! True to color. The cut was cute, because itâ€™s true wrap the slit does come up high but other than a little wind blown situation which I fixed with fabric tape, it laid nicely and stayed put. All in all, I loved and would recommend. Read more
items.author: Hannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: 12/01/23 UPDATE: I loved the black so much I went back for the GREEN as well, again in a LARGE, but this time I got it way cheaper for Black Friday. Now I can't decide which color I like more, so I may keep both! I got this dress in the color BLACK in a size LARGE. For sizing reference, I'm usually a medium or large on top and am currently either a 36E/36F. In bottoms, I'm usually a medium-large or a 8-12/29-31 in pants/jeans, and if it helps, I wear a size 6 or 8 in Lulu leggings. I'm 5'3" tall with a short torso, and my measurements are about 44"-33"-44" (bust-waist-hip) right now, give or take. I've been on the hunt for a dress to wear to an upcoming work holiday party and this is the third one I've tried. I finally learned my lesson and stopped sizing up, and I'm so glad because this fits me absolutely perfectly and is TTS. This is a true wrap style dress, and on the first part of it, there are two buttons on the inside to pick from depending on how tight you want it. It'll only afford you about an extra inch on the waist, but I love that they did that. I have mine on the tightest one and again, perfection. I'm on the shorter side and the length was just right for heels - I have a little bit of extra material dragging (I took a pic standing normally so you can see about how much). The string to tie the outer portion of the wrap is nice and long, and I was actually able to wrap it all the way around to tie in the front if I wanted, so I'd say the sizing is super forgiving. Lots of cleavage, but I expect that in a wrap dress, and it makes them look really good. I'm not one to find a lot of clothes that I absolutely love on my body, but I feel really cute in this. The material on this is a really short velvet, so while it does have that weird texture per usual, it isn't bad at all. The inside is comfy. My husband isn't a fan of velvet but he didn't mind this. I love that is has a bit of a sheen to it, so it looks a little nicer than just a plain black material would. The weight is enough to feel a tad warmer without being too hot. I like in Texas in an area where it's warmer and humid all the way into January, so I wanted something that would sit somewhere in the middle. I tried mine on with a cute metal belt I had, just to emphasize the waist a bit, but I think I like it best without it... I haven't quite decided. Overall, this is a gorgeous dress that is really comfy but still flattering and nice enough to wear to a wedding, a party, or even something more casual. I'm definitely keeping this one and maybe even snagging other colors. Read more
items.author: K

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, just not my favorite fit
items.body: This dress came exactly as describedâ€”true to size, great quality, and super soft velvet. The color was rich, the slit was elegant, and the bell sleeves gave it a fun, dramatic touch. That said, I just didnâ€™t love how it looked on me. Totally a personal preference, because everything else about the dress was spot-on. ðŸ‘— True to size âœ¨ Lovely fabric ðŸ’Œ Worth trying if the style speaks to you! Still giving it 4 stars because itâ€™s a beautiful pieceâ€”it just wasnâ€™t my perfect match. Read more
items.author: SocialMadeMeBuyIt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I WANT ALL OF THEM
items.body: This dress is so cute and so flattering!! I got the brown one for family pictures and I was testing to see if I wanted to get it as a bridesmaid dress in the navy. I WANT TO GET IT IN EVERY COLOR! Iâ€™m not a huge velvet fan, but this dress is so soft and GOOD quality. Itâ€™s thick and stretchy in all the right places so it fits very well. The slit is also not crazy either if that is something youâ€™re worried about. I only have to be mindful of it when Iâ€™m sitting. Itâ€™s great for elegant parties, family pictures or church. Read more
items.author: Tom Pearson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High End Look
items.body: The dress was very flattering, soft and comfortable and looked very high end! I didnâ€™t end up wearing because it was actually too nice for the event I planned on wearing it to. But I would recommend Read more
items.author: keasha emilson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and long enough
items.body: Beautiful. Itâ€™s the right color of green (not too dark). Itâ€™s also long enough. Iâ€™m 5â€™7â€ about 135lbs and many of these maxi type dresses hit at the shin and look odd. Itâ€™s stretchy and the small fit great. Also, nursing friendly which is a plus for me. Canâ€™t wait to wear for Christmas photos and Christmas Eve mass. Read more
items.author: Allison

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color doesn't match the pictures
items.body: Ordered the lighter blue color and it is much darker sort of a royal blue navy color. I needed the right color for a wedding I am in. Otherwise beautiful dress. Thick material. Fit is good. Stretchy for the large chests Read more
items.author: LAO

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Luxury
items.body: This rating is based on my 1st order: I ordered the burgundy. The color and heavier velvet material that made it feel more luxurious than expected, but it wore very comfortably. I got lots of compliments. Although it's short-sleeved, it's not something I'd recommend for a hot summer event. 70 degrees would be okay if you're not going to be moving all over the place but 80 degrees...better stay your butt inside. I'm 5'2" and it was way too long but I just wore it with my highest heels and it was barely lifted from the sweeping the ground. (The length would be better for someone at least 5'6".) I usually wear an XXL, mainly for my larger mid section, but I got this in an XL and it draped nicely for a flowy fit. (I could do a large for a more form-fitting look.) The tie is placed a bit too low for my height and the inside button to hide your cleavage is a bit high, but still a great dress. >>> 2nd order: I ordered another color to take advantage of a sale but it arrived with pet hair all over it. I was unable to try it on because I'm allergic. If you're going to resell a previously returned item, at least make sure it's in new condition! I had to return it. Read more
items.author: SLP

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Split V Neck Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Split V Neck Formal Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Burgundy, Black, Champagne, Coffee, Olive, Red, Emeraldgreen, Navy, Haze Blue, Earthyorange, Silvery, Mauve, Teal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
